website_summaries.verdict: The Acer B326HUL is a 32-inch professional-grade monitor that uses Vertical Alignment (VA) panel technology to deliver very good gray-scale performance and inky blacks. You get a generous selection of I/O ports and picture settings, but out-of-the-box color accuracy is less than ideal given the price.
pros: Gray-scale performance was very good in our tests

customer_reviews.title: Decent Monitor, just beware
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you have the correct cable(s) in order to ensure correct display mode recognition. This monitor uses the AUO M240UAN02.0 panel. The specs are as follows: Brightness: 300 nits Static Contrast Ratio: 1000:1 Bit Depth: 6-bit + FRC panel Response Time: 14 ms NTSC Gamut: 77% sRGB Gamut: 100% Adobe RGB: 78% DCI-P3 Gamut: 80% Rec.2020: 58% Based on like-model reviews, I'd take off about 5% for the gamut values. This is a primary limitation of LED backlighting. You'll have to spend 2x more cash in order to get a higher color quality monitor. It is not a popular monitor per se, but did come out in the height of "no bezel is a good bezel" so there's that.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: UHD and WQHD in a pair work well
customer_reviews.text: I ended up getting one of the UHD 4K monitors as well as one of the WQHD monitors, both in 32 inches. The 4K is my main monitor with the WQHD as the secondary and I couldn't be happier. They work well in a pair, practically identical on the exterior. I've had no issues that I've seen other's complain about with shadowing, flickering or color. I tried to go with a larger 39 inch monitor but found it too large to be productive on, so this may be the perfect size. A few months in I'm very happy, I'll update this review if I run into any issues.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased and headache free (from no longer squinting at computer)
customer_reviews.text: Very very pleased with this monitor for the purpose of reviewing text (that is normally unreadable on my computer at its native setting) without squinting or needing to constantly 'pan and scan' with scroll bars (due to retention of large desktop area with this monitor). Nice features include various ports for various ways to connect monitor, with many needed cables included with purchase (though for my purposes, I need to buy a separate mini-DP to DP cable for about $10). Adjustable height and orientation with sturdy swivel base are also welcomed touches. I liked it so much I just purchased a second one for use in my work office (as this one is in home office area).
customer_reviews.author: working guy

customer_reviews.title: Great 4k Monitors for price!
customer_reviews.text: Have three of these connected to a pair of R9-270's crossfire 1-DP, 2-DVI. Very clear picture. Response time is good for gaming on the DP connected monitor, haven't tried game that stretches all 3 yet. I can game on one monitor, watch Netflix 2nd monitor-waiting to respawn, chat on the 3rd monitor Running at max resolution. Of course have windows scaling set at 200% so to be able to read. Some apps do not scale well, but even with the very small print, easier to read than my old 1920x1200 monitors.
customer_reviews.author: Spamhater007

customer_reviews.title: Quite defective
customer_reviews.text: The monitor came with three issues: 1. Screen goes black for about a second every 30 minutes or so 2. The DisplayPort didn't work 3. The USB hub didn't work I have a second monitor hooked up to my PC without problem. Unfortunately I waited more than 30 days so I can't return it to Amazon. After contacting Acer support, I am on the hook to ship it to their repair center. You are gambling if you purchase this monitor and I don't recommend it. The only reason I gave it 2 stars instead of 1 is because the monitor is quite nice otherwise, which I expected since it is IPS and 2560x1440.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Hutchings

customer_reviews.title: Great resolution and size but major quality issue
customer_reviews.text: This monitor has a great resolution and size. The colors are good, off angle viewing is so so. It is set far too bright out of the box at 100%, easy to scale down with good menu controls. Could not get displayport cable working initially but need to set Windows to maximum power settings. Works now. Quality issue - after 4 days of use a vertical red line appeared on the monitor. My girlfriend also bought one of these and mine is being replaced by Amazon. I will update this review if more issues arise. Hoping this was a rarity.
customer_reviews.author: Piltorious

customer_reviews.title: I removed a star because there is one annoying problem with the Acer
customer_reviews.text: I own both this and the Dell U2713HM. It's comparable to the Dell in resolution and size and features and the Acer was about 30% cheaper than the Dell. However, I removed a star because there is one annoying problem with the Acer: when I plug in my laptop (Surface Pro 3) into another monitor (which I frequently do) and I plug it back into the Acer, I have redo my monitor settings in Windows. I don't have this problem with the Dell U2713HM. It seems to always remember my settings. I couldn't find a software fix from Acer for this issue. I wonder if anyone else having this issue or is it just unique to me?
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Lost one star because audio is so bad as to be a lie
customer_reviews.text: I needed a monitor with speakers. That's why I picked this monitor. My laptop running on battery has louder speakers than this thing running of 120V. But it is a beautiful screen. 28" of 4K beauty. Great colors. Watching Planet Earth 2 on it right now. (with sound from my laptop mind you).
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Briant

customer_reviews.title: Solid 4k monitor!
customer_reviews.text: Mine performed perfectly right out of the box. Held typical 4k 30hz on hdmi and native 60hz with display port. I bought a different displayport cable as other reviewers said they had issues, so I just threw mine away without testing it just to avoid any issues. The display did not have any serious ghoasting while utilizing displayport, but as expected I had ghoasting while on hdmi at 30hz. I did not have any buzzing or backlight bleed as other reviewers experienced. I now plan on buying 2 more as I wanted to see this monitor first hand with the mixed reviews. All I can say is if you get a good monitor, you wont be disapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Vidsavage

customer_reviews.title: =) Good size to get more total screen space when limited ...
customer_reviews.text: I am using two, one landscape and one portrait. =) Good size to get more total screen space when limited to a 33" wide desk top. =) Appropriate resolution for the screen size. You aren't buying more resolution than you can (typically) use. =( Using portrait rotation, the USB charging connections are now at the top. Wires stick up higher than the monitor as a result.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Fuscie

customer_reviews.title: Great 4k resolution at a decent response rate
customer_reviews.text: Great 4k resolution at a solid response rate and price. Sure there are 4k monitors out there with better colors, and some with a 120hz refresh rate vs the 60hz here, heck some even have g-sync. But if you're not absolutely dying to have any of those and want a budget friendly 4k monitor for some gaming/editing, this monitor is right up your alley. 28'' of 4k is a TON of screen real estate. If you want more screen space for editing of modeling but cant fit a dual monitor setup at your work station, this may be a great fit. Provide your rig can pump out enough 4k content to keep it satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: N Wats.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a big PC gamer. I upgraded this for FSX as eventually I will have three of these (once I have the space). This monitor goes way beyond my expectations. It is a well constructed and designed product. No dead pixels, nice and bright and adjustable. Only the quick start printed instructions were included but I figured it out. (I suggest you download the PDF manual prior to the box arriving). It fits on my hutch just as I expected. Just an overall great product. I would highly recommend Acer.
customer_reviews.author: CaptKirk

customer_reviews.title: Buzzes when text is displayed.
customer_reviews.text: Buzzed when text was displayed on the screen. Very irritating, don't recommend due to this possibility. Couldn't return because it was too old, just threw it out.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and cheap 4k display!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this monitor as a refurb so I expected at least a couple dead pixels but I haven't noticed any. I have it hooked up via Displayport to a 970 FTW+ evga graphics card, burns it a little hot when gaming at 4k but holy crap is it beautiful and I don't know what all these people talking about ghosting is about maybe it's their connection. I've had zero issues with this display.
customer_reviews.author: Tobi

customer_reviews.title: Great (so far) 16x10 monitor
customer_reviews.text: I just received this monitor and can't speak for longevity yet, but as someone that needs and appreciated lots of screen "real estate" (16x10 ratio monitors) for the work I do, I am very happy with this purchase. The stand has great adjustability too. I am not a graphics person so I can't speak to color accuracy but it is bright and easy to look at for long periods of time. The colorful pictures that I use for my desktop seem natural and look great.
customer_reviews.author: kperkins

customer_reviews.title: The picture quality is phenomenal - the extra full HD resolution (1200p vs 1080p) is very nice for adding some vertical screen real estate
customer_reviews.text: These are very versatile monitors. I was surprised that there isn't an HDMI port. The picture quality is phenomenal - the extra full HD resolution (1200p vs 1080p) is very nice for adding some vertical screen real estate.
customer_reviews.author: Law Office of Molly B. Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Drops video signal, especially after sleeping
customer_reviews.text: From the beginning, the windows that had been on the display when it went into power saving mode would often pop back on the main laptop display (Thunderbolt to DisplayPort adapter). Fiddling with the energy-saving settings seemed to help some. After a few months (after the return time and support time expired), it started to drop signal (display black) for a few seconds about once a minute or so.
customer_reviews.author: ReliaSolve

customer_reviews.title: Good for the $
customer_reviews.text: Good value for money. Some issues with flicker. Monitor has difficulty connecting to some devices, requiring power on-off of monitor, the search for input takes longer than many laptops timeout, so a little tricky at times. At this size, a curved screen may be easier to use, but the price point jump may not be worth it for some users.
customer_reviews.author: WOODY-G

customer_reviews.title: Not for small spaces!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor sits 7" away from the wall when the base is flush to the wall and you cannot adjust that, so you're gonna want to skip this if you're tight on space. Otherwise, it's a great monitor, I use it for gaming and watching movies mainly. It also moves very smoothly once you break that initial stick.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: visuals great - audio from internal speakers...not so good
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor - my only disappointment was the quality of the sound coming from the internal speakers - it's really bad and sounds like it's coming through a tin can. I tried all of the volume and tone adjustments available, finally just gave up and bought a cheap pair of external speakers. Too bad as I wanted to eliminate the clutter of external speakers. Other than that drawback I do enjoy the monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality for a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: The screen is okay for the price. Definitely has issues with backlight bleeding and the one I got had a scratch on the screen. The picture is sharp though, so if you are looking for a cheap 4K screen and you can live with quality issues, than proceed. I ultimately returned mine.
customer_reviews.author: izzy

customer_reviews.title: Can't ask for much more with this
customer_reviews.text: A great monitor overall, IPS is amazing, 4K is good, extra USB ports are good. I've used this monitor for about a year for at least several hours a day and I still haven't found any fault with it. The only thing that could make this better is if they removed the built-in speakers (who uses those anyways?) since it would save weight and cost.
customer_reviews.author: Raleigh Littles

customer_reviews.title: It's nice! A bit hard to clean though
customer_reviews.text: I'm looking at it right now! It's nice! A bit hard to clean though. Somebody must have sneezed on it, and now there's this smudge that won't go away. I should dump all my friends and find new ones, because it would be awkward to interrogate each person I had let try out Overwatch in 4K on my computer.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: I'm fine playing games with 60hz
customer_reviews.text: Loving this monitor. Coming from 1080P to this is a crazy step up. I'm fine playing games with 60hz. Leo Bodnar input lag tester shows only an average of 11 milliseconds of input lag. Great for games and videos also a lot of space to work with. Best monitor i bought for the price. $274.99
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: i own two of these. considering getting a third. this is the best monitor i've ever had. wonderful image quality and it works well for gaming. i also love that the monitor can be rotated so that it's vertical instead of horizontal. i have one in landscape mode and the other in portrait mode, which helps for homework/research/etc.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Wei

customer_reviews.title: The stand is really nice. Lately monitor makers have been cheaping out on ...
customer_reviews.text: The monitor is spectacular. Default settings are very bright...had to tone it down a little to avoid having to work in my Ray-Bans. Colors are vibrant. The stand is really nice. Lately monitor makers have been cheaping out on the stands...some don't even tilt. This one moves (smoothly) in all directions and the perfect position is easy to set. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jacka

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful monitor, great picture.
customer_reviews.text: Picture is amazing. Monitor itself looks nice. No dead pixels. The stand is stable and adjusts smoothly. My only gripe, and it is a small one, would be the internal speakers. They are pretty bad - but I wear headphones and just wanted something with built in speakers just for the random occasion where I wanted sound but didn't want to put on headphones.
customer_reviews.author: wedge

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and well-behaved
customer_reviews.text: I've got 3 of these on my Microsoft Surface 2 computer and my wife has 2. Excellent picture and ability to rotate.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Schmor

customer_reviews.title: Everything looks extremely beautiful on it
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints about this monitor whatsoever. It is my first 4k monitor, so I really don't have anything else to compare it to. Everything looks extremely beautiful on it, I would recommend this if you don't have a thousand bucks to spend on a high end 4k monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Can anyone help?
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor, exactly what I expected. One issue, for me, the monitor speakers make a very annoying hissing sound when there is a lot of white on the screen. I've already put the speaker volume to zero. Funny thing is, when it starts hissing, if i put the speaker volume up to one then back to zero it goes away. But it always comes back after a while, even though I left the volume at zero. I am using the DisplayPort cable that it came with. Can anyone help?
customer_reviews.author: Phillip A Faciana

customer_reviews.title: Nice, thin
customer_reviews.text: Nice, thin, bright, clear monitor. Small borders make for a tidy size in a 24 inch, 1920 x 1200 monitor. It's only been in use for a few days but it is already far superior to the 2009, 24 inch, 1920 x 1080 Acer it replaced. I didn't wire the speakers so I can't speak to the quality of sound.
customer_reviews.author: MWM

customer_reviews.title: Superb lower price 24" 1920-1200 displayport monitor
customer_reviews.text: Displayport, DVI, VGA (No HDMI). Has superb stand with almost infinite adjustment. Stand hides VESA mount point and removes easily. Really thin bezel, 3 of these connected with Displayport to a good gaming oriented graphics card looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Hampton

customer_reviews.title: These monitors are beautiful. The 16
customer_reviews.text: These monitors are beautiful. The 16:10 aspect ratio is great for work and still looks fantastic for media. I got two of these side by side. The thin bezels make the two feel almost seamless. The screen is bright and crispy! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Nate H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought it. Works great. Only issue I have is that it sometimes doesn't sync right if turned on after the Mac. Turn on first, then turn on/unsleep sleep Mac.
customer_reviews.author: What's the frequency, Kenneth?

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great monitor, especially if you can get it for under $300. I love the rotating screen and the adjustable base. Can't beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice monitor, it's got a good screen
customer_reviews.text: Nice monitor, it's got a good screen. But I had the same problem some other reviews reported. After a day or two of use it started buzzing constantly. I probably could have lived with it but I want my monitor completely silent
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing monitor. Flicker free
customer_reviews.text: Amazing monitor. Flicker free, no dead pixels, rock solid. Would buy again or recommend. If there is a con it would have to be the brightness. Default settings were too bright for me, but was able to turn down.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Monitor!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is great! The colors aren't quite as vibrant as the retina display on my MacBook Pro, but the clarity on this monitor is absolutely amazing. I have had no issues with the display thus far (fingers crossed), and I'm using a DisplayPort cable with it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Poor Viewing angles and inaccurate colors
customer_reviews.text: Viewing angles aren't that great, and the colors aren't as accurate as I'd hoped. Spring for an IPS display from Asus if you have a bit more cash to work with and are using this monitor for design purposes.
customer_reviews.author: tbeaty

customer_reviews.title: Good price with good quality
customer_reviews.text: Crisp image, usb3 hub, 2560x1440, and stereo speakers. Everything i needed for a work monitor. Good price with good quality. I had ordered a cheaper product but the displayport interface failed within a week. Went back to Acer, this is the third one that i has purchased, all three are excellent!
customer_reviews.author: gchiu

customer_reviews.title: Graphics in games are awesome with this monitor
customer_reviews.text: Graphics in games are awesome with this monitor, waiting for the price to come down a tad before ordering the second monitor though.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great 4K Monitor for PC Gaming!
customer_reviews.text: I have had 28-inch UHD monitor for a little over 5 months and it has performed great. I bought it through Amazon Warehouse Deals for a great price. I use the monitor mainly for PC gaming and watching movies. It produces a crisp clear picture with great color. I would recommend this monitor to anyone looking to upgrade their PC gaming experience.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: The size I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I am 55 years old and suffer from eyestrain and with this monitor I don't even have to wear my glasses! I bought the first monitor to check the size, now I bought a second monitor and put in a dual monitor desktop arm.
customer_reviews.author: mdays

customer_reviews.title: I've gone ultrawide and I'm never going back
customer_reviews.text: Love the ultrawide look. Beautiful, flawless display. Bought Certified Refurbished; I couldn't tell it from brand-new. Fits perfectly on my 48" desk. Only downside is the sparse selection of 2560 x 1080 source material.
customer_reviews.author: 11celtic11

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Monitor one dead pixel.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful monitor, however I have one single dead pixel near the center of the screen. I really like the stand's flexibility to hold the monitor off kilter. Also, awesome to have VESA mounts for when I move it eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Nimrod

customer_reviews.title: The Acer is about 1/2 the price of the Apple Thunderbolt Display and the resolution is fantastic. I write code all day and the A
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my Apple Thunderbolt Display with this Acer monitor. The Acer is about 1/2 the price of the Apple Thunderbolt Display and the resolution is fantastic. I write code all day and the Acer reduces eye strain by a large amount. The text is crisp and the colors are vivid.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon Vandergriff

customer_reviews.title: Bright, clear and a good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought one from another supplier and needed one to match since the resolution was insanely more than my other two monitors. Can't beat the resolution and brightness for the price.
customer_reviews.author: G@dgetG33k

customer_reviews.title: Monitor emits high pitched alarm randomly
customer_reviews.text: The monitor will start blaring a sound like a smoke alarm randomly in use. no idea how to disable it without turning the monitor off and on again.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: This monitor was recommended by our computer guy. It took some getting used to the wide screen but it is great especially when you are on the computer all day.
customer_reviews.author: CMMP

customer_reviews.title: Dead Pixels
customer_reviews.text: 4k is very nice. I've been waiting to get one for around 2 years and finally pulled the trigger a month ago. It definitely meets my expectations. The only problem is that the monitor I received had dead pixels on arrival. This is not a major problem because they are difficult to even notice from 2 feet away but I am still giving this product 3 stars to warn that the product quality may not be very high.
customer_reviews.author: Xanin

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price if you need a second ...
customer_reviews.text: Good buy for the price if you need a second monitor for your shop. Unfortunately, I got a bad unit that somhow went through QC. Thanks Amazon for easy return.
customer_reviews.author: hoangtran

customer_reviews.title: colours are great viewing angles are OK
customer_reviews.text: It is big, colours are great viewing angles are OK, but ghosting effect spoils eveything
customer_reviews.author: djulm

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT!!! 4K LOOKS GREAT. THIS COMES WITH ALL CABLES YOU NEED . YOU CAN PUT THE SCREEN WHERE YOU WANT IT AND HOW YOU WANT IT. LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Juan B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I can not go back for a standard screen anymore. This one spoiled me for life...
customer_reviews.author: Juan Redin

customer_reviews.title: Good product though
customer_reviews.text: Had to send back just wasnt what I wanted. Good product though.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Harper

customer_reviews.title: the resolution of a 4K monitor is awesome, not much reflection
customer_reviews.text: Pro: the resolution of a 4K monitor is awesome, not much reflection, and the viewing angles are great. Cons: My monitor makes noise when I'm doing high performance tasks, the speaker is pretty dull and not much volume, and personally most of the cables it came with was not long enough to reach my computer.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Ma

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor for the price. I use it in the vertical position for coding. Just wish I could turn down the intensity more with a simple button, for work in a darkened room in the evenings.
customer_reviews.author: Dark Saga 66

customer_reviews.title: I was very surprised how much I like this monitor
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised how much I like this monitor, I thought the size would be to much but it mounts nicely on my arms and has many features that great and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: InMyOpinion

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great resolution and color. Nice size for my needs, no problems since installation.
customer_reviews.author: K. Nwachukwu

customer_reviews.title: bought if for my son and he absolutely loves it ...
customer_reviews.text: bought if for my son and he absolutely loves it. Very affordable and light relatively speaking. However, if I were to do it again, I'd get an all-in-one with a camera, but that's my fault.
customer_reviews.author: dcjava

customer_reviews.title: Movie like expirience
customer_reviews.text: Just watched Blue Ray of a Rented REDBOX of FAST AND FURIOUS 7, great picture Regards, Rafael
customer_reviews.author: Rafael S.

customer_reviews.title: Productivity
customer_reviews.text: I was debating on buying this or a 'low cost' 4k mostly for productivity/multi programs. I am very happy with the purchase and saved me money in the long run. I will consider buying another one here shortly!
customer_reviews.author: tyler

customer_reviews.title: we love it, we split screen and use it like ...
customer_reviews.text: We've had it for a few months now, we love it, we split screen and use it like two monitors.
customer_reviews.author: Dalila

customer_reviews.title: Loses screen color/sharpness intermittently
customer_reviews.text: I am on the second monitor and will be replacing it yet again. There must be a quality issue with the batch I am receiving because on multiple computers and different cables, the screen intermittently has washed out color and loses crispness. I received a pretty good deal on this monitor, but I would rather pay less for one with consistent quality. Otherwise this has all of the hookups I need, a USB hub, a great aspect ratio, good stand, good resolution, etc.
customer_reviews.author: S. Klinger

customer_reviews.title: This screen is awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This screen is awesome!!! But beware if you are switching from 1920x1080 everything is seen as smaller on this monitor because it is 4x that resolution. I am still recommending it because it looks amazing and is definitely an improvement for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value and quality 4K LCD.
customer_reviews.text: High quality design at affordable price. I bought two and mounted on quad monitor stands with another two 24 inch LCD. It works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: WCC

customer_reviews.title: three out of three fails
customer_reviews.text: I love the thing but I had to get replacement - I sent the first one back and got this one as replacement this one works great. - i would advise to stay away form these acer b28khk models I have had three of them thought they where great turend out to be junk all three took crape with in a years time.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Hardy

customer_reviews.title: So far I have no issue with the monitor. ...
customer_reviews.text: So far I have no issue with the monitor. The reason why I am giving it four star is that every time I turn on the monitor it has to display the "ACER explore Beyond Limits" and the "energy ENERGY STAR" logo. I really do not want to see them.
customer_reviews.author: micAtal Nic

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor, fast shipping, plug and play.
customer_reviews.text: Nice big display. Not very heavy, compared to my old 28 in monitor.
customer_reviews.author: JoeJanJr

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: The monitor is too bright even after turning the brightness and contrast down to zero. It hurts my eyes looking at it more than an hour. I am very disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great value
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't ask for a better looking screen for the price. My only complaint is that I can hear a faint, high-pitched buzzing when the screen is displaying something brightly colored. But if you wear headphones as much as I do, you won't even notice it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: The monitor DOES have HDMI... for an extra $3!
customer_reviews.text: You simply need an HDMI-DVI cable:  Great 1920x1200 monitor, by the way! The stand is fully adjustable (up/down/rotate, tilt) and the bezel is really thin (it actually looks thicker in the product photo). If I HAD TO list any negatives, I'd say the buttons are not labeled and you have to work the OSD for adjustments. But then again, you do these things ONCE a year or less. The built-in speakers are really tiny, so don't expect decent sound.
customer_reviews.author: Felix and Diana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Picture from these monitors, sometimes you feel like your looking thru a window.
customer_reviews.author: Xion

customer_reviews.title: Nice monitor and stuck green pixel yay...
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is great! However there is one minor complaint, there is an obnoxious green stuck pixel near the middle of the screen. I might return this product, otherwise I really like it. But the stuck green pixel is kinda distracting and unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: jacobzahorik

customer_reviews.title: otherwise it is really nice!
customer_reviews.text: only downside is fps is locked to 30 from above 1080p resolution.. otherwise it is really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Garrett James

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor. I've been goofing around with iMovie for a couple of years on my MacBook Pro. This enriches the experience expediently, at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Odonnell

customer_reviews.title: Good color accuracy, slightly poor viewing angles
customer_reviews.text: Color accuracy and amount of options are perfect. OSD interface is a bit wonky, but not enough to subtract a star. The viewing angle is where this monitor is lacking a bit, but don't let that detract from a purchase. It was a seamless transition from my old HP LP2475w. If you have an older monitor and need something decent for all types of media as well as for graphic design work, this fits the bill nicely. The extra screen real estate really does make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Bought this one -  -Not one year later and I have to purchase a New monitor.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the monitor in Sept. 2015 and this past week - - May 2016 the monitor just quit working. Simply not working any more. I really needed this monitor as a second larger monitor to work on a project. Now I have to purchase another monitor and trash this one. I guess I should have purchased the warranty. Anyway. . .
customer_reviews.author: turtle dove

customer_reviews.title: ... just that everything else surrounding it holds it back like older shows look really pixelated on this unless you ...
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with the product itself it's just that everything else surrounding it holds it back like older shows look really pixelated on this unless you change the scaling .
customer_reviews.author: dann

customer_reviews.title: I have an Asus 29" and very satisfied with it
customer_reviews.text: I have an Asus 29" and very satisfied with it. I needed another and bought the ACER, hoping it would be just as good. It was just as good and over $100 cheaper. Perfection.
customer_reviews.author: George Knutson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: seems great so far picture is top notch for the price
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Spevacek

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent monitor. Speakers of the monitor are really bad, But, most do not connect audio to the monitor, anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, perfect image and response time, speakers too quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Gallina

customer_reviews.title: The display looks pretty good when it actually works though
customer_reviews.text: Main issue I have with it is the inability to select the input--it automatically scans ( a process which can take up to two minutes) any time signal is gone....which includes whenever the computer restarts, or there is an error on screen that you are oh-so-desparately trying to read. Extremely obnoxious behavior. The display looks pretty good when it actually works though. It's a shame I have to blindly mash the keyboard whenever the computer turns on to select which OS I boot into.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Just received the monitor. The Quick Guide that comes ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received the monitor. The Quick Guide that comes with the it is very skimpy. The Acer online chat provide me with the following link for a detailed manual.  I will add to this as I explore it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles A. Spillner

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a 4k monitor
customer_reviews.text: Great value for a 4k monitor...ended up having to buy a new computer to support 4k but thats my own fault.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: amazing screen! Great contrast
customer_reviews.text: Pros: amazing screen! Great contrast, resolution, and fps (with dp). Cons: first of all, it's really heavy. It's multiple times as heavy as my 1080 p 27 in monitor. Also the stand isn't amazingly secure. Even just pushing the power button the screen wobbles a little. It's not serious but it's noticable. Overall it's a great monitor and ignoring the stand there are no setbacks in regard to it's function (display).
customer_reviews.author: luke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great montior although a but big to justify a swivel option.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Needs Calibration
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this monitor I hated it. It seemed the colors were all off and it seemed totally washed out compared to my IPS monitor. However after some time screwing with the saturation levels and resetting the gamma level through the system preferences, I'm at a point where Its quite awesome. Its still no IPS monitor, but at the price the resolution makes up for it.
customer_reviews.author: InTents

customer_reviews.title: Looks very nice, good price, good quality, easy setup.
customer_reviews.text: It's really good, a nice picture, easy setup - price is very fair. The only thing I wish is that it was about one inch longer....I use it mainly for music production (Sonar and Pro Tools). I would still recommend it based on quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Keith

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price.
customer_reviews.text: Just a beautiful large monitor. Great for gaming, spreadsheets, and just about everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Tomatoe Tim

customer_reviews.title: I love this monitor
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor. I can't believe I spent that much money on a monitor. But I love this monitor. Speakers suck. But the monitor is clear, bright, huge and heavy. Perfect for playing games, or working and having multiple windows open at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Tinybear

customer_reviews.title: Good buy but plain Jane.
customer_reviews.text: I like the high resolution but feel the monitor could be a little more futuristic looking. The colors don't seem to jump out at me, but fall a little flat. Overall for the money though, it's a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Motsenbocker

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this monitor! It's big and beautiful, fast enough for my games and very reasonably priced. Even comes with a variety of cables for hooking up. Would have been a 5 1/2 but, alas, no bottle opener.
customer_reviews.author: Rhys L.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work with my MBP 2014.  At all. Tried with two, shipped both back.
customer_reviews.text: Mabook pro, mid 2014. I sent two back. They just flash on and off. I tried different HDMI cables,and two different display port / thunderbold cables. Nothing works. Acer support is totally useless.
customer_reviews.author: BT07030

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Is better than having a 2 monitor setup, easy to display 2 or 3 documents at once. Games run great on the monitor, most games support this resolution.
customer_reviews.author: MP27

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I took a risk with this monitor and really like it! It looks great on games and can fit a TON of code on the screen at once. The only problem is you'll need a second screen if you're on Windows....it doesn't scale things very well at all, and some things are unreadable at this resolution. I had to keep my other monitors for this reason, though that's not necessarily a bad thing. I'd recommend this without hesitation and may buy another.
customer_reviews.author: bvande

customer_reviews.title: Durable Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I freakin' love this monitor. I have knocked it off my desk twice in a couple unfortunate incidents, but It still works perfectly. NO DEAD PIXELS!!!!
customer_reviews.author: David Potts

customer_reviews.title: Buy this! Dont listen to any of the noise about "problems"
customer_reviews.text: Im pretty sure some people get messed up products occasionally. I just never seem to be one of those people. I put this sucker together and am blown away by how amazing it is. Some people say light bleeds through the bottom. It does. When your pc is booting up! Dont notice it at all otherwise. The "ghosting" that had me on pins and needles????? nothing. I havent seen it. Just a great product for an amazing price. And being a prime member, I had this shipped overnight for 11 dollars!!!!!!!!! 11 dollars! Amazon is awesome, and this monitor is so sick at any cost, much less this price.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Mcginnis

customer_reviews.title: be sure to change your display port settings to 1.2
customer_reviews.text: simply a beautiful investment. several "holy s***!" moments so far. its very worth it. Though something to bear in mind: my monitor came with Display Port V. 1.1 enabled. This format comes with a max refresh rate of 30 hz. one has to change the device settings to display port 1.2 to enable 60 hz refresh rate.
customer_reviews.author: james loring

product_meta.title: Acer B326HUL ymiidphz 32-inch WQHD (2560 x 1440) Widescreen Display
product_meta.description: Size:32-inch WQHDAcer B-Series monitors sport a super-slim profile that lets them fit nicely in spaces of any size. Outstanding performance, eco-friendliness and smart use of energy complement the sleek design - all while staying well within budget. The Acer B326HUL showcases a 32" Widescreen WQHD LCD with impressive 2560 x 1440 resolution. Enjoy widely available 16:9 HD digital content without image distortion on the expansive widescreen LCD. The remarkable 100 Million:1 contrast ratio ensures a crystal-clear viewing experience while rapid 6ms response time keeps moving images sharp. It also supports both DVI and HDMI inputs offering greater compatibility. The Acer B-Series LCD brings an amazing multimedia experience to your home with a widescreen cinematic view and a unique fighter pilot style.
feature_bullets: The ultra-thin 32-Inch LED display comes encased in an stylish bezel matched with a sturdy black base. The flexible height adjusted and rotation stand can tilt and swivel for the optimal view and includes cable management and VESA wall mounting support to keep things neat and tidy.
Enjoy widely available 16:9 HD digital content without image distortion on the expansive 32-Inch widescreen LCD.
The B-Series 32-Inch LCD is designed for High-Definition with a stunning 2560 x 1440 resolution.
Signal Inputs: 2 x HDMI, 1 x DVI-D, 1 x Display Port

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars299 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
